data.title: Antoine and Colette / Love at Twenty Original R2022 French B2 Movie Poster Signed by Tom Haugomat
data.meta_description:
Limited edition of 30.
Signed and numbered by the artist Tom Haugomat.
4-color process print on 100# cover. Signed by Tom Haugomat. Fine condition, rolled.
